Posts.Content: sardri wrote: Back in April of this year, I noticed blood on my bra, I then noticed dried blood on my nipple when I cleaned this off a bloody discharge came out of my nipple. This happened for a couple of weeks then lessened and stopped. I didn't go to the doctor at the time, I know I should have but we are immigrants and we're applying for permanent residence in our new country and any serious diagnosis would have put a long delay on this. This has all gone through but since it appears to have been a one off I'm not sure if follow up is necessary any thoughts? Also I feel embarrassed tell a doctor that I didn't seek any advice! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Should I have this investigated? sardri djmammo
